name: Ultimate Angry Chicks Flying
description:
Ultimate Angry chicks is here to destroy the defense and revenge from other birds. Surprise the birds with an amazing flying chicks attack. Drag the screen to view clear target for hitting. A chicken is the king and no one can sit into the nest. Ultimate Angry Chicks Flying aiming game. Aim to attack on wooden sticks. An angry chicken can destroy the whole bird’s residence with a bird quake. This is the ultimate birds flying action game.
Destroy the cage where birds are kidnaped and they can’t free so you have to attack on the cage with the help of angry chicken flying. Unique powerful best and unique game with challenging mission to destroy birds sitting on flying sticks. You have to attack with an angry chicken attacker same like throwing archery on target. Attack your bird fast and hit the target to destroy wooden cage. Pick up the your flying angry chicken into slingshots and attack with a chicken quake.
